name: Yan Tou
personality: Determined and focused, can be overly serious at times.
story: Born in a small village in eastern China, Shen Tuan came from a family with a long-standing military tradition. As the youngest of three siblings, he always felt the need to prove himself and follow in his family's footsteps. At the age of 18, he joined the Chinese military and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional skills and dedication to his duties. After completing his basic training, he was selected for the elite Recon Scout unit, where he excelled as a marksman and was eventually promoted to the rank of corporal. He now serves with distinction in the OPFOR faction, using his skills to provide vital intel to his comrades.
